SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.network.Servers

Class CentralServer

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.network.Servers.CentralServer
public class CentralServer extends Object
This class serves as a central server for the subsequent creation of two dedicated servers, one for the management of network communication via RMI technology and the other for the management of network communication via Socket technology. Moreover, the class takes care of receiving server-side messages by activating the controller that handles the pre-game phase.
Author:
Alberto Aniballi

  • Constructor Details

    • CentralServer

      public CentralServer()
      Constructor of CentralServer instances. Instantiate a new controller that handles pre-game phase.

  • Method Details

    • start

      public void start()
      This method activates two different servers, one RMI and the other Socket, ensuring that both technologies function correctly at the same time. The two servers are associated to two different ports but to the same controller instantiated at the time of initialisation.

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      This method instantiate a new CentralServer and starts it. In order for MyShelfie to function properly, it is always necessary to run this main method to ensure that there is a central server listening for connection requests from clients.
